question: You need to take leave from your work for almost a month for some personal reasons. Write a letter to your Manager. In your letter:• Explain the reason for your leave & the length of your leave.• Explain how you intend to deliver the task that was given to you recently and has to be turned in in a week’s time.• Explain how & who will look after your work while you are away.
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I would be requiring a leave of 10 days starting from 10Aug2022. I would need this leave on the occasion of my brother's marriage.

At the outset, I want to assure you that we will achieve the database lock by the start of Aug and no major other timelines are expected during the time frame. the vendor edit check assignment which was expected to be completed next week is already accomplished as I wanted to recompense the leave duration.

Secondly, during my absence, Mr Narayan will work for my allocated trials and the approvals have been received from the client site. The trials are in the conduct phase and require regular reconciliations and vendor management.
Hence, I would request you to grant my leave from 10th to 20th Aug and inform our human resources team as per the organizational policy.
Awaiting your positive response to the above request.
